item.title: testcontainers 101
item.description: well, it was about time to start writing some code in this - supposedly - blog that shows how i become a 10x engineer. one might start to think the fastest approach to do it is to stop writing code. no way.

item.title: the meta post
item.description: this is probably the post that makes the least sense of all but i still need to get some practice before i get into business and dive deep into the technicalities so here it is
